directions: Gently mix watermelon, tomatoes, mint, onion, and feta cheese in a large bowl.
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper together in small bowl; drizzle over salad and gently toss to coat.
ingredients: 1 large seedless watermelon, cut into 1-inch cubes
1 pinch coarse salt, or to taste
1 pinch ground black pepper, or to taste
title: Tomato Watermelon Salad
